channel.title: Regular Expressions :: IT From Scratch
channel.description: Finding Text Patterns with Regular Expressions Input import re phone_num_pattern_obj = re.compile(r'\d{3}-\d{3}-\d{4}') match_obj = phone_num_pattern_obj.search('My number is 415-555-4242.') print(match_obj.group()) Output 415-555-4242 Grouping with Parentheses Input import re phone_re = re.compile(r'(\d\d\d)-(\d\d\d-\d\d\d\d)') mo = phone_re.search('My number is 415-555-4242.') print(mo.group(1)) print(mo.group(2)) print(mo.group(0)) print(mo.group()) print(mo.groups()) area_code, main_number = mo.groups() print(area_code) print(main_number) Output
